info.title: BillingManagementClient
info.description: Billing client provides access to billing resources for Azure subscriptions.

get.description: Lists the enrollment accounts the caller has access to.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a enrollment account by name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Enrollment Account name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the available billing periods for a subscription in reverse chronological order. This is only supported for Azure Web-Direct subscriptions. Other subscription types which were not purchased directly through the Azure web portal are not supported through this preview API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter billing periods by billingPeriodEndDate. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N billing periods.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a named billing period.  This is only supported for Azure Web-Direct subscriptions. Other subscription types which were not purchased directly through the Azure web portal are not supported through this preview API.

parameters.name: billingPeriodName
parameters.description: The name of a BillingPeriod resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the available invoices for a subscription in reverse chronological order beginning with the most recent invoice. In preview, invoices are available via this API only for invoice periods which end December 1, 2016 or later.  This is only supported for Azure Web-Direct subscriptions. Other subscription types which were not purchased directly through the Azure web portal are not supported through this preview API.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the downloadUrl property within a list of invoices. This enables download links to be generated for multiple invoices at once. By default, downloadURLs are not included when listing invoices.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter invoices by invoicePeriodEndDate. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N invoices.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a named invoice resource. When getting a single invoice, the downloadUrl property is expanded automatically.  This is only supported for Azure Web-Direct subscriptions. Other subscription types which were not purchased directly through the Azure web portal are not supported through this preview API.

parameters.name: invoiceName
parameters.description: The name of an invoice resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the most recent invoice. When getting a single invoice, the downloadUrl property is expanded automatically.  This is only supported for Azure Web-Direct subscriptions. Other subscription types which were not purchased directly through the Azure web portal are not supported through this preview API.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available billing REST API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all billing accounts for a user which he has access to.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the projects and billingProfiles.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by permission. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the billing account by id.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the projects and billingProfiles.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by permission. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all billing profiles for a user which that user has access to.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the billing profile by id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all projects for a user which he has access to.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the eligibleOffers.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by permission. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

202.description: Accepted. Project creation is in progress.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: The operation to create a project.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Project operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the project by id.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the eligibleOffers.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by permission. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: The operation to update a project.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Project operation.

202.description: Accepted. Project update is in progress.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all eligible offers for specified billing account id.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the billingProfiles.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the eligible offer by id.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the billingProfiles.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the enrollmentAccounts.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Enrollment Accounts for a user which he has access to.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the department.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the Department.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the status of pending Microsoft.Billing API operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

policies.description: The attributes associated with legacy enrollment.

EnrollmentPolicies.description: The attributes associated with legacy enrollment

reservedInstancesEnabled.description: The reserved instances flag for Enrollment

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

enrollmentAccounts.description: Associated enrollment accounts. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

department.description: Associated department. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

BillingPeriodsListResult.description: Result of listing billing periods. It contains a list of available billing periods in reverse chronological order.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

BillingPeriodProperties.description: The properties of the billing period.

billingPeriodStartDate.description: The start of the date range covered by the billing period.

billingPeriodEndDate.description: The end of the date range covered by the billing period.

invoiceIds.description: Array of invoice ids that associated with.

DownloadUrl.description: A secure URL that can be used to download a PDF invoice until the URL expires.

expiryTime.description: The time in UTC at which this download URL will expire.

url.description: The URL to the PDF file.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

BillingAccountProperties.description: The properties of the billing account.

address.description: The address associated with billing account.

currency.description: The ISO currency, for example, USD.

country.description: The country associated with billing account..

projects.description: The projects associated to the billing account.

billingProfiles.description: The billing profiles associated to the billing account.

enrollmentDetails.description: The details about the associated legacy enrollment. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

departments.description: The departments associated to the enrollment.

enrollmentAccounts.description: The accounts associated to the enrollment.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

BillingProfileProperties.description: The properties of the billing profile.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

eligibleOffers.description: The eligible offers attached to the project.

costCenter.description: The cost center for the project.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

EligibleOfferProperties.description: The properties of an Eligible Offer.

parentAssetId.description: The id of the parent asset.

billingProfiles.description: The billing profiles associated to the eligible offer.

availabilityId.description: The availability id used by purchase.

legacyId.description: The legacy id of the product.

OperationStatus.description: status of the Billing POST/PUT operation.

statusDetail.description: Status Detail of the pending operation

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

Invoice.description: An invoice resource can be used download a PDF version of an invoice.

InvoicesListResult.description: Result of listing invoices. It contains a list of available invoices in reverse chronological order.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

downloadUrl.description: A secure link to download the PDF version of an invoice. The link will cease to work after its expiry time is reached.

invoicePeriodStartDate.description: The start of the date range covered by the invoice.

invoicePeriodEndDate.description: The end of the date range covered by the invoice.

billingPeriodIds.description: Array of billing perdiod ids that the invoice is attributed to.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Invoice, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

OperationListResult.description: Result listing billing operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of billing operations supported by the Microsoft.Billing resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2018-03-01-preview.
